name: @tremho/jove-app-template
description: Blank template for Jove supported NativeScript apps using TypeScript
author: Tremho Berserker Development, LLC <tremhoberserkerdevelopment@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p src/assets && mkdir -p src/scss && cd node_modules && ln -sf @nativescript/core/image-source image-source && cd @tremho/jove-mobile && npm install
mkdir -p src/assets && mkdir -p src/scss && cd node_modules && ln -sf @nativescript/core/image-source image-source && cd @tremho/jove-mobile && npm install
